item.title: Carol Altieri, Longtime CBS Standards and Practices Executive, Dies at 76
item.description: Longtime CBS standards and practices executive Carol Altieri has died at her home in Palm Desert, Calif. after a long illness. She was 76. Altieri died Aug. 9, CBS confirmed. A native of Queens who gr
